channel.title: Aerodynamics on Ney
channel.description: Recent content in Aerodynamics on Ney

item.title: Dynamic Mode Decomposition of Large-Scale Aerodynamic Simulations of Base-Bleed Projectiles
item.author: thiagoneye@outlook.com (Thiago Rodrigues)
item.description: This study applies Dynamic Mode Decomposition to analyze and reduce CFD data of base-bleed military projectiles, identifying dominant dynamic modes of the velocity field from 2D axisymmetric simulations.
